mapper.select: SELECT m.optionname, m.price, m.username, i.filename, mp.productnum FROM ( SELECT productnum, min(optionnum) as optionnum FROM ${username}_product WHERE productnum = #{productnum} GROUP BY productnum) mp LEFT JOIN ${username}_images i ON mp.productnum = i.productnum and i.filename LIKE '%\_1%' escape '\' LEFT JOIN ${username}_product m ON m.productnum = mp.productnum AND m.optionnum = mp.optionnum
SELECT u.image, s.* FROM ( SELECT shopname, shopcontent, regdate, address, username FROM shoplist WHERE username=#{username}) s JOIN userdetails u ON s.username = u.username
select distinct optionnum, username, follow from ${username}_mypage

select m.count, i.filename, p.optionname, p.price, p.optionnum, s.shopname from (select * from ${follow}_product where optionnum=#{optionnum}) p left join ${follow}_images i on p.productnum=i.productnum AND i.filename LIKE '%\_1%' escape '\' and i.filename NOT LIKE '%P\_%' escape '\' left join ${username}_mypage m on m.follow=p.username and m.optionnum=#{optionnum} left join shoplist s on s.username=p.username
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ${username}_mypage WHERE productnum = #{productnum} AND wishstatus = 1
DELETE FROM ${username}_mypage WHERE follow = #{follow} AND wishstatus = 2
delete from ${username}_mypage where optionnum=#{optionnum} and wishstatus=3
mapper.select: select m.orderdate, m.realprice, a.productname, p.optionname, s.shopname from (select * from ${username}_payment where sid='simple payment') m left join allproduct a on m.follow=a.username left join ${follow}_product p on m.optionnum=p.optionnum left join shoplist s on m.follow=s.username
